jobDescription: Assist with key operational processes across the organization.  Support day-to-day operational tasks, maintain and update reports, work with cross-functional teams, analyze data, support process improvement, resolve operational challenges, and ensure compliance.
requiredSkills: Project management and tracking tools (Azure DevOps, Trello)
Strong verbal and written communication skills
preferredQualifications: Bachelor's degree in business, operations, commerce, or related fields
